mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.goods_id, s.repository_id, s.current_num, s.goods_size, s.init_num, d1.name as goodsTypeName, d2.NAME as goodsQualityName FROM storage s LEFT JOIN dir d1 ON s.goods_type = d1.id LEFT JOIN dir d2 ON s.goods_quality = d2.id WHERE s.storage_status = '0'
AND s.goods_type = #{params.goodsType}
and s.goods_id like concat("%",#{params.goodsId},"%")
and s.goods_size like concat("%",#{params.goodsSize},"%")
order by s.goods_id,s.goods_quality
